Text.Page:
Just passing through, eh?

I'm guessing you're on a mission, or you wouldn't be in such a hurry.

I tell you what: Let's have a riddle contest. If you win, I'll let you pass.
Ha! What a tough customer you are! Very well.<TEXTBUTTON>"I don't have time for this." </TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>"Just open the door already." </EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
Okay, just a moment. I'll open the door for you.
